    • transcriptHeader

      public String transcriptHeader(String studentID, String prefix, String forename, String surname, String courseName, String courseCode, String courseRoute)
      Generates the transcript header.
      Parameters:
      studentID - The student ID.
      prefix - The student's prefix.
      forename - The student's forename.
      surname - The student's surname.
      courseName - The name of the course.
      courseCode - The code of the course.
      courseRoute - The route of the course.
      Returns:
      The header of the transcript as a formatted string.

    • getFormattedTranscript

      public String getFormattedTranscript(ArrayList<Double> semesterQCA, double totalQCA, ArrayList<String> semesterYears, ArrayList<Integer> totalYears, int totalSemesters, ArrayList<String> moduleIds, ArrayList<String> moduleNames, ArrayList<String> gradeLetters, ArrayList<Integer> moduleCredits)
      Generates the formatted string of each semester and its respective modules.
      Parameters:
      semesterQCA - The semester's QCA.
      totalQCA - The average QCA.
      semesterYears - The string of the semester year as yyyy/yy.
      totalYears - The course year of the semester.
      totalSemesters - The accumulative number of semesters in the course.
      moduleIds - An arraylist of modles codes.
      moduleNames - An arraylist of module names.
      gradeLetters - An arraylist of result strings.
      moduleCredits - An arraylist of credits.
      Returns:
      The full transcript string.

    • semesterHeader_n_QCA

      public static String semesterHeader_n_QCA(double semesterQCA, double totalQCA)
      Formats a string for QCA informatin and headers foe module information.
      Parameters:
      semesterQCA - The semester's QCA.
      totalQCA - The average QCA.
      Returns:
      a string with headings and QCA information for a semester.
